content.html: A couple of years ago, @jk_rowling said she would march with trans people for their rights. This was untrue. Today, her Scottish "gender critical" allies are protesting against trans rights not that far from her gaff. She'll march with them, right? No, she tweeted a selfie.
content.value:
A couple of years ago, @jk_rowling said she would march with trans people for their rights.

This was untrue. 

Today, her Scottish "gender critical" allies are protesting against trans rights not that far from her gaff.

She'll march with them, right?

No, she tweeted a selfie.
